channel.title: How the hell do I make NPC's move please I need help!
channel.description: In autospawn there is an X and Y and a X2 and Y2 what do I type under that. Please help!! QUICK!

item.title: How the hell do I make NPC's move please I need help!
item.dc:creator: @sh1pwr3ck sh1pwr3ck
item.description:
@sh1pwr3ck wrote:

okay when u open autospawn ull c something like this

spawn = 2821	2856	3599	0	0	0	0	0	1	Zeke

now spawn = 2821 is the npc’s id. the 2856 3599 is the cords. the 2856 is the x cords and 3599 is y cords.

change the 2856 3599 to the cords you want and u can change the npc id by changing 2821 to w.e u like.
and the 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke u don’t have to change. but if u change the 1 to a 0 , 2 , 3 , it changes the way the npc is facing.

hope this helps=)

Read full topic
item.source: How the hell do I make NPC's move please I need help!

item.title: How the hell do I make NPC's move please I need help!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

YRange1 N XRange1

W E

XRange2 S YRange2
